entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:48 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 09:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
